name: Aurura Team.
body: ### Aurura, A place for dream. What do we build? ============== We use resources to build the next generation of programming. Our intend is to provide an environment for non-programmers to easily find their way to code. Projects: (Currently on-working) ====================== Limestone-Interpreter : An easy environment to Natural Programming. [OpenWord](http://github.com/Aurura/OpenWord): A client-server SaaS tool for foreign language studying, such as Fran√ßais. [Amplife](http://github.com/Aurura/Amplife): An extremely light-weight blogging platform featuring Google's Material Design. GodCraft: A virtual environment to virtualizing the world, including real society. Join us: ======== Feel free to mail to join@aurura.net, or just Join us now!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
